text: Ezɨ kamaghɨra ia gumazir igiaba ia gumazir dapanibar akaba baragh egh men apengan ikɨ. Egh ia bar uari abɨrir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨva egh uaghan Godɨn gumazamiziba men apengan ikɨ. Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “God, gumazir uan ziaba feba, a me dɨkabɨri, egha a gumazir uari abɨriba, a men apangkuva, deraghavɨra me gami.”
